comments:
i200504140800

Got the following NPE using this build and changing the target to be
i200504011205. It seems the only way this could happen is if the bundle
description PDE is calling getFragments on has not been added to a state yet
(what is not allowed).

>PDE is calling getFragments on has not been added to a state yet
not added or not resolved?

Not added. The containing state reference (which is null, causing the NPE) is
set whenever a bundle is added to a state (before resolution).

This may have something to do with the i200504140800 being unuseable.  I tried 
the same thing with the I20050413-0910 build and it worked for me.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 91537 ***
